Description: Provides income support of Rs 6000 per year to eligible farmer families.
Benefits: Rs 6000 per year in three equal installments.

Description: Provides insurance coverage and financial support to farmers in the event of crop failure.
Eligibility: All farmers growing notified crops in a notified area.
Benefits: Comprehensive insurance cover at low premium rates.

Description: Promotes soil testing and provides a soil health card to farmers with crop-wise recommendations.
Benefits: Helps farmers use fertilizers and nutrients efficiently.

Description: Covers losses to farmers due to natural calamities, pests & diseases through insurance.
Eligibility: All farmers including sharecroppers and tenant farmers.
Benefits: Financial support in case of crop failure.

Description: Aims to strengthen the infrastructure in agriculture and allied sectors.
Benefits: Development of agriculture infrastructure and innovation.
